mapper.insert: insert into article (title, content, created_time, columns_id, user_id) values (#{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content, jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{createdTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{columns.id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{user.id, jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select a.id as aid, a.title as atitle, u.id as uid, u.username, c.id as cid, c.title, t.id as tid, t.name from article a join user u on a.user_id = u.id join columns c on a.columns_id = c.id join article_tag at on at.article_id = a.id join tag t on at.tag_id = t.id where a.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
select a.id as aid, a.title as atitle, t.id as tid, t.name from article a left join article_tag at on at.article_id = a.id left join tag t on at.tag_id = t.id order by created_time desc limit 0,20
